belongs_to_collection.name: La notte dei trailer viventi - collection

response.overview: The second volume of an inimitable and popular series, the ideal gift for cinema lovers: the most exciting trailers in the history of cinema brought together in a phantasmagoric sarabande of immortal images, from "The Wizard of Oz" to "Moby Dick", from "Someone up there loves me" to "Grand Hotel", from "Ninotchka" to "Citizen Kane". The most beautiful films ever seen through the peephole of the trailers with unforgettable images of Fleming, Wise, Curtiz, Lubitsch, Goulding, Huston and many others
response.title: La notte dei trailer viventi 2
